# readRS() :

```{r}

## args :
temp.paths <- c("../inst/extdata/NT1-S1.bdg","../inst/extdata/NT1-S2.bdg")
temp.fractions <- c("S1","S2")

## apply function :
temp.RS <- readRS(temp.paths,temp.fractions)

## outputs :
head(temp.RS)
typeof(temp.RS)
summary(temp.RS)

```
